akas from release info: Kill Them All Show UK (promotional title)
imdb.plot outline: Kill Them all (KTA) is a silent stick-man action animation about a nameless boy who witnesses his fathers murder and 12 years later, begins a one man crusade to kill the people responsible for his fathers' demise. In every episode, he will go after his fathers killers, who are part of a worldwide, well connected crime syndicate known as THE ASSOCIATION. Each member of the group is recognized by a different colored arm band. The villain going to fall in each episodes' color will be shown in the main title logo.
imdb.title: Kill Them All
plot: _Kill Them All_ (qv) (KTA) is a stick-man action animated series about a boy who after witnessing his fathers murder begins a one man crusade to avenge his death.::Prince Michael II

Kill Them all (KTA) is a silent stick-man action animation about a nameless boy who witnesses his fathers murder and 12 years later, begins a one man crusade to kill the people responsible for his fathers' demise. In every episode, he will go after his fathers killers, who are part of a worldwide, well connected crime syndicate known as THE ASSOCIATION. Each member of the group is recognized by a different colored arm band. The villain going to fall in each episodes' color will be shown in the main title logo.::Prince A. Boakye
